name: ROMBY
description: In ROMBY you will earn points by placing 4 and even more figures of one color in a straight line. Earn more points and open all hidden girls. Trust me it won't be easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo E4500 2.20 GHz or Athlon X2 7450 2.40 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB of VRAM and DX9 support Storage: 500 MB available space
